pages.title: Organic Compost
pages.text: Organic Compost can be placed in-world to eventually compost into Rich Soil. The composting process can be sped up with sunlight, adjacent water, and adjacent water.

pages.title: Rich Soil
pages.text: Rich Soil can be tilled for crops to grow. Crops growing on Rich Soil will grow faster than normal and will be more resistant to trampling.
